summary: An heiress begins to realize her attraction to one of her family's servants.
cast: Anita Björk|Ulf Palme|Märta Dorff|Lissi Alandh|Anders Henrikson|Inga Gill|Åke Fridell|Kurt-Olof Sundström|Max von Sydow|Margaretha Krook|Åke Claesson|Inger Norberg|Jan Hagerman|Torgny Anderberg|Bibi Andersson|Per-Axel Arosenius|Frithiof Bjärne|Ingrid Björk|Helga Brofeldt|Sture Ericson|Georg Fernqvist|Hartwig Fock|Svea Holst|Holger Kax|Birger Lensander|Martin Ljung|Signe Lundberg-Settergren|John Norrman|Maud Walter
title: La señorita Julie
